Opposite Craigieburn Central!
If you're looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go!
Situated in a quiet location opposite Craigieburn Central Shopping centre, public transport, local schools and shops, medical centre, child care facilities and the Craigieburn golf club, you really do have everything at your fingertips.
Featuring a great floor plan and many extras included heating & cooling, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, study and much more.
Don't let this opportunity pass you by, THIS ONE WON'T HANG AROUND FOR LONG!!!

Description:
LUXURY FAMILY HOME
This Modern Home Design has a striking street appearance. Finished beautifully and boasting amazing features it has to be seen to be believed. Offering large 4 bedrooms master with ensuite and walk in robes remaining bedrooms all of which enjoy built in robes.
A family bathroom with a freestanding tub of equal quality and style conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms.
Desirably situated in the highly popular Aston Estate, this home gives value a whole new meaning.
The carefully considered open plan layout maximizes the utility of the area, and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family.
The open plan living area is complemented by direct access to the outdoor alfresco, providing this unique property to offer simple pleasures in an impressive manner.
Let's not forget to mention the neat and elegantly designed kitchen with a walk-in butler's pantry, ideal for entertaining, featured with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and Dishwasher.
The alfresco leads you to the back yard with low maintenance, delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Other features include - High square set ceilings, double glazed windows, alarm system, heightened doorways, double remote garage with extra second kitchen with drive -thru access, landscaped gardens, central heating, refrigerated cooling and much more.
The Luxury inclusions of this home are numerous and at large. You owe it to yourself to view it and appreciate what's on offer.
Call Harman 0433 421 110 for more info .
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Vogue Living in Mickleham
A ready-made lifestyle of quality, class and ultra modern features this stunning home will have you in awe the moment you step inside.
With its flexible floor plan, this premium home showcases 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe) first class ensuite & separate bathroom, powder room, separate lounge or study, spacious open living/dining area enhanced by a stone-bench top kitchen with an abundance of storage space & stainless steel appliances.
Add to this refrigerated cooling & heating, solar/gas hot water, LED lighting, internally accessed remote garage plus a low maintenance yard with a leafy outlook. With a host of extras such as soft close kitchen drawers, quality light pendants, ducted grills throughout, high ceilings, duel blinds, intercom, alarm & so much more. Simply move in & enjoy.
Also close to Club Trillium with all its exclusive residents' facilities, as well as easy access to primary & secondary schools, shopping centres & Hume Freeway via the newly-opened Grand Boulevard extension.

Description:
ON THE CRAIGIEBURN BORDER!!
Sure to make an impression that lasts, this luxurious Porter Davis 'Provincial' inspired family home is well situated the highly coveted "Trillium Estate" right on the border of Craigieburn.
Greeted by a spacious entry, on offer are good sized bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, a well-appointed kitchen with stone bench top, 900mm SS appliances, dishwasher and walk-in pantry, adjoining to the open plan meals and family area, theatre room, separate formal lounge/multipurpose room, a study/home office and spacious decking alfresco with large stacking door and beautiful landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double garage, separate central bathroom, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, quality window furnishings, chic light fittings & quality floor coverings including.
Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throws away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!
Internal area
306.58m²

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and stone benchtops the home flows effortlessly to the open plan meals area and adjoining family room. The master bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite while the remaining bedrooms have built in robes.
A host of extras include split system heating/cooling, single lock up garage with remote control entry and internal access, backyard perfect for entertaining and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Highlands shopping centre, Newbury Child Care and Primary school, parklands and public transport, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Luxury Lifestyle In Exclusive Aston Location
Be seduced by this quality built home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list.
Flanked by beautifully landscaped gardens, walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk-in robe & ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large-scale family gatherings and one to please the ardent chef, a vogue kitchen with great storage, quality s/s appliances & ample stone bench space.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco, enclosed and complete with a fully integrated kitchen which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides lush emerald green grass which will be the perfect haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Located to perfection, within close proximity to local schools, parklands Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including ducted heating, cooling, CCTV, double remote garage, sparkling central bathroom, family-sized laundry with loads of cupboard and bench space & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now and be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
Brand New Living
Picturesque, light filled and designed for modern day living, this home will impress even the fussiest of buyers. Built to the highest of standards, this masterpiece spares no expense and with a custom design layout giving enough room for a growing family.
Stepping inside, you will be greeted by a widened hallway, stunning master bedroom with luxurious ensuite and walk in robe, formal lounge, amazing gourmet kitchen with top of the range stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops, walk in pantry/butlers pantry overlooking to a generous sized meals and adjoining family room and to top it off, sliding doors to a spacious backyard.
The remaining 3 generous size bedrooms with BIR are also serviced by a deluxe central bathroom. The inclusions list is even better, consisting of timber floorboards throughout, tiles in bathrooms and carpet in bedrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a double lock up garage.
Located in Botanical Estate, the most popular Estate and the largest growing community in the North. Quality, Space and Style are all apparent as you drive up to this unique family home.

Address: 27 Douglas Mawson Drive Roxburgh Park VIC 3064
Description:
When Size and Location Matter!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh Park is proud to present an architecturally designed and meticulously landscaped 27 Douglas Mawson Drive, Roxburgh Park. This awe-inspiring landmark property has a grandiose living experience and is stunningly spread across approximately 626m2 of land showcasing a picturesque view of Greenvale Reserve at the rear.
Standing tall on approximately 44 squares this very well designed dual-storey brick beauty features 5 Large-size bedrooms, 3 living areas and two bathrooms, 3 toilets and a whole lot of top-quality fixtures and fittings that add to its elegance.
The journey into the house begins with a view of a central staircase and a formal living which is accompanied by dining, a study/5th bedroom and flooded with natural light during the day. An extremely spacious kitchen with S.S.A appliances, dishwasher, pantry and plenty of cupboard space where storage will never be an issue, adjacent the family meals and rumpus all looking out to the beautifully landscaped garden for family and friends to enjoy.
The upper floor comprises of a master bedroom with his and hers walk-in robes and full en-suite. other 3 bedrooms are equipped with built-in robes, a centralized bathroom, two balconies and a retreat, all on the same floor at your convenience.
The property boasts all the luxury appointments one would expect from a home of this caliber including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, intercom system, timber flooring, window furnishings, downlights throughout, wood fire heater, laundry with access to rear yard, a 2 car remote controlled garage with internal and drive through access, rear yard featuring outdoor gazebo and landscaped gardens and much more.
Situated within minutes from Roxburgh Park Primary & Secondary Schools, Homestead Shopping Centre & within easy access to Somerton Road, this property is not to be unseen.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Modern Family Expanse with Mandalay Prestige
Set on a wonderfully wide allotment (approx 748sqm), this Mandalay masterpiece delivers an aspirational family environment with its vast and versatile floorplan, first-class features throughout and close proximity to the area's five-star lifestyle attractions.
Beautifully appointed, the home's meticulously detailed interior showcases an extra-large master bedroom with fitted WIR and 3 additional bedrooms (BIRs), together with a deluxe ensuite, equally-stylish main bathroom and guest powder room (third WC) - all with stone-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles.
Add to this a dedicated study/home office (or fifth bedroom), light-filled lounge, separate rumpus/living room and expansive open-plan family/dining area complemented by a gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops and island/breakfast bar, ample cupboard space and large walk-in pantry, dishwasher and 900mm cooking appliances.
High square-set ceilings throughout, the home also boasts ducted heating, evaporative cooling and additional split-system air conditioning, comprehensive security system (alarm, CCTV and video intercom), solar power, large laundry and excellent storage options.
Step outside to discover a spectacular fully-enclosed al-fresco area complete with second kitchen for all-seasons entertaining, plus a big backyard and internally-accessed remote-control double garage with drive-through option.
Walking distance to Mandalay's renowned golf course, bus stop, local parks and extensive walking trails along with exclusive use of Club Mandalay facilities, it also offers easy access to Donnybrook Station as well as Craigieburn's schools and shopping centres 15 minutes down the Hume Freeway.
Inspection times -
Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Live the Mandalay Lifestyle - A spectacular 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom residence where exceptional indoor and outdoor spaces match the enviable lifestyle attractions of the exclusive Mandalay Estate including a renowned golf course, residential club house, Olympic size Swimming pool and Tennis courts. Never sold before, a home that set benchmarks when it was built c2012 - and still does so today - the appeal of a flexible formal lounge and huge family living areas is complemented by a superb Caesar-stone kitchen and sensational enclosed alfresco entertaining, with a fabulous red gum fitted bar, Merbau floors and seductive 4 person hot tub. Description:
Quality and Style for Perfect Modern Living!
No need to build when you move straight into this as-new single-level home that's sure to exceed all expectations with its free-flowing design, impressive upgrades and immaculate garden surrounds.
Flawlessly presented and meticulously detailed, the home's impressive interior comprises 3 generous bedrooms (master with WIR) together with a stylish ensuite and main central bathroom - both with stone-top vanities.
Bathed in natural light, the versatile open-plan living/dining area is further enhanced by a well-appointed kitchen complete with stone benches (including island breakfast bar), large walk-in pantry, dishwasher and 900mm cooking appliances.
Ducted heating and split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with efficient LED lighting and concealed laundry facilities, plus a sunny backyard with perimeter garden beds and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to the bus stop on Highlander Drive, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary and secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds and shopping centres, as well as easy access to both Mickleham Road and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Open By Private Inspection - Where Quality And Quantity Combine!
Zed Real Estate is cooperating and responding to the Governments restrictions to the Real Estate market in relation to the Covid-19 outbreak by complying with the governments decision to cancel all public open for inspections and auctions and only conducting private viewings for properties.
Our team will follow the advised social distancing regulation put in place of 1.5 meters and will have hand gloves and sanitizing products for use for both ourselves and our clients. We would like to thank you for your understanding during these unprecedented times.
Enjoying the peace and privacy of a generous 777m2 allotment, on one of prestigious Craigieburns finest streets, this stunning family home showcases panoramic city views, bespoke designer style, lavish proportions and the finest of finishes, all combining to deliver a lifestyle of contemporary luxury.
Entered via an enticing boardwalk through easy-care landscaped gardens, you are ushered into a two-storey interior that introduces elegance, sophistication, and a brilliant sense of space accentuated by high ceilings, solid Tasman Oak floors, Quality carpets newly installed and the finest quality European tiles used throughout. The banks of full height windows allow plenty of natural light into the home but also feature block out blinds with e-screens.
Enhanced by hard-wearing, good-looking, glossy timber floors, the expansive lounge dining on the entry level is complemented by a generous open plan living-meals. Anchored by a wood heater coonara and wrapping around the kitchen, walls of bi-folds peel back to deliver seamless access to alfresco spaces perfect for relaxed entertaining. Lunch will easily morph into dinner against a backdrop of the city thats enthralling by day, enchanting by night.
The chefs kitchen hosts the finest appointments. From custom-designed and built cabinetry showcasing quality SMEG appliances complemented by a sleek glass splashback, an abundance of storage options, to a very handy island bench, perfect for everyday meals, it looks as good as it cooks!
The entry-level is also host to the first of five bedrooms. Adjacent to the powder room, it would be ideal for guests or work very well and a home office if desired.
A showpiece statement staircase invites you upstairs where you'll discover the main suite with retreat space, spa ensuite (floor to ceiling tiles), dressing room and an outlook to the city, and three further bedrooms served by a designer detailed family bathroom.
Cleverly integrated under the house and accessed from both Excelsior Heights and Scenic Terrace is garaging for three cars and a large workshop and storage space.
Additional security benefits include: Security Alarm, Australian safety standard hand-railing with lockable gates on all balconies and crime safe security doors.
Merely minutes from parkland, sports grounds, public transport, shops and schools, desired extras include double roller blinds, quality carpet complementing timber floors, substantial fitted laundry, ducted heating, and cooling and multiple split system units ensure exceptional living in an elite location!
Insights: 37 Excelsior Heights, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 4 bedroom residence combines
an exceptional floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made brand new environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive facade, discover a brand new & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite with upgraded fixtures & stone bench top with floor to ceiling tiles, 3 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family striking bathroom also containing floor to ceiling wall tiles. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area is a well- appointed kitchen with 80mm stone benchtops, soft closing draws, dishwasher & plenty of cupboardspace. Other stand-out features include Refrigerated zoned cooling & ducted heating for all seasons comfort, 2700mm high-ceilings, alarm system with video intercom, floating timber flooring throughout, double remote garage with internal access, family sized laundry with added storage, washing machine & stone benches.
Step outside & be greeted by fully landscaped gardens and located in a blue ribbon location, within close proximity to all of Craigieburn amenities, public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Insights: 55 Juscelina Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
